# Binaries for programs and plugins
*.exe
*.exe~
*.dll
*.so
*.dylib

# Test binary, built with `go test -c`
*.test

# Output of the go coverage tool, specifically when used with LiteIDE
*.out

# Dependency directories (remove the comment below to include it)
# vendor/

# Go workspace file
go.work

# IDE files
.vscode/
.idea/
*.swp
*.swo
*~

# OS generated files
.DS_Store
.DS_Store?
._*
.Spotlight-V100
.Trashes
ehthumbs.db
Thumbs.db

# Project specific files
firewall
firewall.exe
firewall.json
firewall.log
*.log

# Build artifacts
bin/
dist/
build/

# Coverage files
coverage.out
coverage.html

# Temporary files
tmp/
temp/

# Configuration files (may contain sensitive data)
config.json
.env
.env.local
.env.production

# Backup files
*.backup
*.bak

# Archive files
*.tar.gz
*.zip
*.rar

# Node modules (if any frontend tools are used)
node_modules/

# Docker files
.dockerignore

# Certificate files
*.pem
*.key
*.crt
*.csr

# Database files
*.db
*.sqlite
*.sqlite3

# Session files
cookies.txt
